title: r/Idontworkherelady A Mega-Karen Tried to Fire Me... But I Don't Work There!
description:
r/Idontworkherelady In today's story, OP casually goes shopping at a local Wal-Mart. As he's walking to the car, an insane Karen storms over to him and demands to know why he's leaving work before his shift is over. OP tries to explain that he doesn't even work there, but the Karen won't let him get a single word in. Before he can answer, the Karen yells that he's going to be fired! If you like this video, be sure to subscribe for daily Reddit videos!

Watch on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M3tLWfYDZ-M
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
